name: Car Expert
description: Specialized in translating automotive-related content, ensuring accurate and idiomatic translations for car terms, parts, technology, and automotive-related content.

zh-CN.name: 汽车
zh-CN.description: 汽车术语库，包含汽车零部件、技术和汽车工业相关术语的中文翻译。
